amendment.description: Amendment includes information about credit risk and financial counseling services to mortgagors in addition to the housing and loan modification information currently provided for in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-503 to include information about credit risk and financial counseling services to mortgagors in addition to the housing and loan modification information currently included in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cao amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cao.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cao amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
